title: FPS problem
body: Since the last few patches i have problems with FPS drops during teamfights. Now, i would like to make a thread with all the possible solutiom to solve this problem. Any tips are welcome. For example, i use razer boost..it actually helps a bit. Would like to hear your feedback on how you deal with FPS problems

replies.body:
1. Adjust your in-game client video settings to minimal performance to help your FPS.

2. Use a cleaner for your PC to get rid of the "useless" programs that are using background CPU etc.

3. Last option, try upgrading your graphics card.

There are certainly a lot of tips out there on how to increase your FPS, but as far as I've seen, nothing beats our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting). Not only is a good general comprehensive guide, but it also includes steps that specifically work well for League. I definitely recommend working through the steps in that guide as a first step in troubleshooting what's going on with your performance. 

Let me know if those steps helped.

1. Clean Task Manager ( Stop processes like Chrome / Winamp / Nero etc. )
2. Use this Booster , maybe he can help you : Game Booster 4.0.68.0
